short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: Provides secure two-factor authentication(2FA). Safeguard your digital life with ease.
short.de: Bietet sichere Zwei-Faktor-Authentifizierung (2FA) an. Schützen Sie Ihr digitales Leben mühelos.
short.es: Proporciona autenticación de dos factores (2FA) segura. Protege tu vida digital con facilidad.
short.fr: Fournit une authentification à deux facteurs (2FA) sécurisée. Protégez votre vie numérique en toute simplicité.
short.it: Fornisce un'autenticazione sicura a due fattori (2FA). Proteggi la tua vita digitale con facilità.
short.ja: 安全な二要素認証（2FA）を提供します。簡単にデジタルライフを保護します。
short.ko: 안전한 이중 인증 (2FA)을(를) 제공합니다. 쉽게 디지털 생활을 보호하세요.
short.ru: Предоставляет безопасную двухфакторную аутентификацию (2FA). Легко защищайте свою цифровую жизнь.
short.zh_CN: 提供安全的双因素认证（2FA）。轻松保护您的数字生活。
short.zh_TW: 提供安全的雙因素驗證（2FA）。輕鬆保護您的數位生活。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e:
Authenticator App is a highly secure web extension designed to provide two-factor authentication (2FA) for your online accounts. By generating unique Time-based One-Time Password (TOTP), the 2FA Authenticator provides an extra layer of protection to your accounts when logging in, mitigating the risks of unauthorized access and identity theft.

Note: You need to download our Desktop app for the browser extension to work. Remember to use it with our Desktop app (Supporting Windows & Mac)!

Whether it's popular apps or many online services, Authenticator browser extension has you covered, protecting your personal data and passwords from hackers and malicious attackers. 

With Authenticator web extension and Desktop app, you can:
1. Liberate yourself from dependency on your phone. Authenticator allows you to perform two-factor authentication without even reaching for your mobile, significantly boosting your productivity and saving your valuable time. 
2. Enjoy seamless integration within the Apple Ecosystem. Authenticator web extension supports iCloud sync & backup authentication data across Apple devices, ensuring a smooth experience for Apple users. 
3. Have additional account security. With our advanced encryption technology, your accounts remain protected from unauthorized access, safeguarding your personal information.

Web extension Features:
1. Scan QR code on the website to add 2FA account, seamlessly stored and backuped in your iCloud.
2. Copy your 2FA code with a click, without dependency on your mobile phone.
3. All your accounts are end-to-end encrypted on web extension and Desktop app.

Desktop App Features:
1. Store and generate 2FA codes. The code will update to a new one every 30 seconds.
2. Easy to setup & manage your accounts. Scan QR Codes or enter manually to add accounts. 
3. 2FA encrypted Backup & Sync with iCloud. Sync your accounts across multiple devices using iCloud.
4. Secure use with app password or Touch ID. You are the only one who can read your codes.
5. Import and export 2FA accounts. You can import/export your data from/to other files.
6. User-friendly guide. The app has instructions that describe basic steps such as adding 2FA Code.
7. Support 11 languages: English, German, French, Japanese, Korean, Italian, Spanish, Portuguese, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese.

If you have any thoughts, questions or suggestions, please feel free to contact us at feedback@firstorder.ai
Home page: https://authenticator.firstorder.ai
Terms of Use: https://firstorder.ai/terms-of-service
Privacy Policy: https://firstorder.ai/privacy-policy-authenticator
long.de,es,fr,it,ja,ko,ru,zh_CN,zh_TW:
Authenticator - 2FA Secure is a highly secure web extension designed to provide two-factor authentication (2FA) for your online accounts (currently support macOS). By generating unique Time-based One-Time Password (TOTP), the 2FA Authenticator provides an extra layer of protection to your accounts when logging in, mitigating the risks of unauthorized access and identity theft.

Note: You need to download the macOS app for the browser extension to work. Remember to use it with our macOS app!

Whether it's popular apps or many online services, Authenticator browser extension has you covered, protecting your personal data and passwords from hackers and malicious attackers. 

With Authenticator web extension and macOS app, you can:
1. Liberate yourself from dependency on your phone. Authenticator allows you to perform two-factor authentication without even reaching for your mobile, significantly boosting your productivity and saving your valuable time. 
2. Enjoy seamless integration within the Apple Ecosystem. Authenticator web extension supports iCloud sync & backup authentication data across Apple devices, ensuring a smooth experience for Apple users. 
3. Have additional account security. With our advanced encryption technology, your accounts remain protected from unauthorized access, safeguarding your personal information.

Web extension Features:
1. Scan QR code on the website to add 2FA account, seamlessly stored and backuped in your iCloud.
2. Copy your 2FA code with a click, without dependency on your mobile phone.
3. All your accounts are end-to-end encrypted on web extension and macOS app.

macOS App Features:
1. Store and generate 2FA codes. The code will update to a new one every 30 seconds.
2. Easy to setup & manage your accounts. Scan QR Codes or enter manually to add accounts. 
3. 2FA encrypted Backup & Sync with iCloud. Sync your accounts across multiple devices using iCloud.
4. Secure use with app password or Touch ID. You are the only one who can read your codes.
5. Import and export 2FA accounts. You can import/export your data from/to other files.
6. User-friendly guide. The app has instructions that describe basic steps such as adding 2FA Code.
7. Support 11 languages: English, German, French, Japanese, Korean, Italian, Spanish, Portuguese, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese.

If you have any thoughts, questions or suggestions, please feel free to contact us at feedback@firstorder.ai
Terms of Use: https://firstorder.ai/terms-of-service
Privacy Policy: https://firstorder.ai/privacy-policy-authenticator
